name: ChatwithChancellor
0:
”Alexa, ask my totally legit older friend for the secrets of the force”
”He could actually save people from death?”
”What happened to him?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my totally legit older friend
des: Have an incredibly deep and philosophical discussion with Alexa if you were a bold young apprentice with an older chancellor as a friend who just wants to help you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
